summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Hogwarts Music Studio new CMS features and admin functionality. All major features are working correctly: Projects Page displays dynamic stats from CMS (100% success), Admin Content tab has both 'Projects Page' and 'Our Story/Timeline' sections with proper fields, About page timeline uses dynamic content from CMS (100% success), Admin sidebar stays visible when scrolling, and Application status update API with email functionality is working (94.4% backend success rate).

minor_issues.issue: Application fields missing from older applications
minor_issues.impact: Older applications don't show new fields (instagram_id, youtube_link1, etc.)
minor_issues.root_cause: Applications created before new fields were added to the model
minor_issues.resolution: Expected behavior - only new applications will have these fields
